ctrlife.description: How much control over life in general nowadays
ctrlife.question: How much control do you feel you have over your life in general nowadays?

etfruit.description: How often eat fruit, excluding drinking juice
etfruit.question: How often do you eat fruit, excluding drinking juice?

values.1: Three times or more a day
values.4: Less than once a day but at least 4 times a week
values.5: Less than 4 times a week but at least once a week

eatveg.description: How often eat vegetables or salad, excluding potatoes
eatveg.question: How often do you eat vegetables or salad, excluding potatoes?

values.1: Three times or more a day
values.4: Less than once a day but at least 4 times a week
values.5: Less than 4 times a week but at least once a week

dosprt.description: Do sports or other physical activity, how many of last 7 days
dosprt.question: On how many of the last 7 days did you do sports or other physical activity?

cgtsmok.question: Which of the following best describes your cigarette smoking behaviour?

values.1: I smoke daily, 10 or more cigarettes
values.2: I smoke daily, 9 or fewer cigarettes
values.3: I smoke but not every day
values.4: I don’t smoke now but I used to
values.5: I have only smoked a few times

alcfreq.question: How often do you drink alcohol?

alcwkdy.description: Grams alcohol, last time drinking on a weekday, Monday to Thursday
alcwkdy.question: How many grams of alcohol did you drink the last time you drank on a weekday (Monday to Thursday)?

values.5555: Never drink alcohol Monday to Thursday
